miapi.module.arrow_head_normal.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Arrow Head

miapi.module.bow_arms_long.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Longbow

miapi.module.bow_arms_short.name: [translation.[material.translation]]Shortbow
